Room.Name: Rosecrest Street
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Rosecrest Street, north of a very large intersection.
Room.LongDescription: The large intersection to the south brings together three main roads in Oceancrest: Rosecrest Street, Eidenhoft Boulevard and Waterfront Way. You can see Eidenhoft Boulevard to the east as it is running northeast from the intersection, creating a small sliver of a park between the two roads. There is quite a bit of laughter and screaming to the north.
